title.rendered: PODCAST: Navigating the Perils of Damaged Containers: Proactive Steps to Avoid Overdue Invoices

content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”default” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]
Doxie Digital · Navigating The Perils Of Damaged Containers
[/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Join us for this insightful episode of A Customs Brokerage Podcast, where we unravel the best practices to mitigate the risks associated with damaged containers and keep your import/export business free from overdue invoices. Industry expert Gabriel Rodriguez, President of A Customs Brokerage shares his wisdom on proactive measures, including selecting reliable shipping partners, implementing thorough inspection protocols, and leveraging the power of insurance. Discover the essential tips for fostering seamless communication with carriers and suppliers, ensuring timely payments, and maintaining the financial health of your business.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
